summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2832 for the improvement of Twenty-third Avenue North, between East Highland Drive and East Galer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 34012, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
